description: Schema for AI model metadata and benchmark results

canonical_model_id.description: ID of the main version of this model, if this is a variant, otherwise null

fine_tuned_from_model_id.description: ID of the base model if this is a fine-tuned version

name.description: Short, human-readable name of the model (e.g., 'GPT-4')

description.description: Brief description of the model's capabilities and use cases

release_date.description: Date when the model was officially released

input_context_size.description: Maximum number of tokens the model can process as input

output_context_size.description: Maximum number of tokens the model can generate as output

license.description: License under which the model is distributed

multimodal.description: Indicates whether the model can process multiple types of input (e.g., text and images)

web_hydrated.description: Indicates whether the model has real time access to the web

knowledge_cutoff.description: Date of the most recent data included in the model's training set, if applicable

api_ref_link.description: URL to the API reference documentation for the model

playground_link.description: URL to an interactive playground for testing the model, if available

paper_link.description: URL to the research paper describing the model, if available

scorecard_blog_link.description: URL to a blog post or scorecard of the announcement of the model

repo_link.description: URL to the source code repository for the model in GitHub

weights_link.description: URL to the model repository in Hugging Face

param_count.description: Number of parameters in the model, if known

training_tokens.description: Number of tokens used to train the model, if known

qualitative_metrics.description: Array of benchmark results for the model

dataset_name.description: Name of the benchmark dataset used

is_self_reported.description: Indicates whether the score was reported by the model's creators

analysis_method.description: Method used to calculate the benchmark score

date_recorded.description: Date when the benchmark was performed

source_link.description: URL to the source of the benchmark results
